EQRN 0.1.1.9002
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

EQRN (development version)

  • Modified the backend auto-install behaviour to only happen in interactive environments, after prompting the user for confirmation. This reflects changes of the torch dependency and CRAN installation. (Fixes issue #1).

EQRN 0.1.1

CRAN release: 2025-03-17

  • The EQRN R package has been accepted for publication on the Comprehensive R Archive Network (CRAN)! It is now officially released on https://cran.r-project.org/package=EQRN, with DOI doi:10.32614/CRAN.package.EQRN. One can now install EQRN by simply calling install.packages("EQRN") in R.
  • Deprecated internal functions and package dependencies were removed.
  • Documentation was improved to match CRAN standards.

EQRN 0.1.0

  • Final version from the research paper “Neural Networks for Extreme Quantile Regression with an Application to Forecasting of Flood Risk” by Olivier C. Pasche and Sebastian Engelke (doi:10.1214/24-AOAS1907).

EQRN 0.0.1

  • Initial version from the research paper.

On this page

Developed by Olivier C. Pasche.
